Class FormListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

      • android.widget.CursorAdapter

          • android.widget.SimpleCursorAdapter
            • org.odk.collect.android.adapters.FormListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class FormListAdapter
extends android.widget.SimpleCursorAdapter
    An adapter for displaying form definitions in a list.
